item.title: How do i stop players from using objects to tele away when tele blocked?
item.dc:creator: @0o_jay_o01 0o_jay_o0
item.description:
@0o_jay_o01 wrote:

Never mind!
If anyone needs this

    case ####:
        if (!teleblock) {
            setAnimation(0x714);
            teleportToX = ####;
            teleportToY = ####; 
            sendMessage("Good Luck!");
        } else if (teleblock) {
            sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting.");
        }
        break;
